claim.text: Predicting financial risks of publicly traded companies is an essential task in financial markets.
claim.exact_quote: Predicting financial risks of publicly traded companies is an essential task in financial markets.

evaluation.justification: The claim is justified as predicting financial risks is crucial for investors and market participants.

claim.text: Our multimodal deep regression model (MDRM) outperforms all baselines.
claim.exact_quote: Our multimodal deep regression model (MDRM) outperforms all baselines.

evidence.evidence_text: Table 1: MSE of different models on stock volatility prediction τ -days following the conference call.
evidence.limitations: Limited to the specific dataset and models used.
evidence.exact_quote: Table 1: MSE of different models on stock volatility prediction τ -days following the conference call.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim, showing MDRM's superior performance across various time frames.

claim.text: Both modalities are helpful, and multimodal features are more helpful than unimodal features alone.
claim.exact_quote: Both modalities are helpful, and multimodal features are more helpful than unimodal features alone.

evidence.evidence_text: MDRM (text+audio) outperforms MDRM (text only) and MDRM (audio-only) for 3-days, 7-days, and 15 days stock volatility prediction.
evidence.limitations: Specific to the experiment setup and dataset.
evidence.exact_quote: MDRM (text+audio) outperforms MDRM (text only) and MDRM (audio-only) for 3-days, 7-days, and 15 days stock volatility prediction.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim, demonstrating the added value of combining modalities.

claim.text: Short-term volatility prediction is harder than long-term prediction.
claim.exact_quote: Short-term volatility prediction is harder than long-term prediction.

evidence.evidence_text: The 3-days prediction MSE of MDRM is 1.371, while the 30-days MSE is 0.217.
evidence.limitations: Specific to the dataset and model used.
evidence.exact_quote: The 3-days prediction MSE of MDRM is 1.371, while the 30-days MSE is 0.217.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim, showing a significant difference in prediction accuracy between short and long-term volatility.
